code: import React from'react';import Modal from"react-modal";/* This just wraps react-modal to allow styling the modal overlay, you shouldn't have the need to change this at all */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default(_ref=>{let{className,...props}=_ref;const contentClassName="".concat(className,"__content");const overlayClassName="".concat(className,"__overlay");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{className:contentClassName,overlayClassName:overlayClassName,...props});});
